# zippeR

[![R build status](https://github.com/chris-prener/zippeR/workflows/R-CMD-check/badge.svg)](https://github.com/chris-prener/zippeR/actions)
[![Coverage status](https://codecov.io/gh/chris-prener/zippeR/branch/master/graph/badge.svg)](https://codecov.io/github/chris-prener/zippeR?branch=main)

`zippeR` provides a set of functions for working with ZCTAs and building spatial and demographic data for three-digit ZCTAs.
